Quest.quest_ShortInProgressText: I have to kill 3 Warg enemies, I should found some in the Wolf forest.
Quest.quest_ShortInFailedText: I failed to kill the 3 wargs enemies in due time...
Quest.quest_ShortCompletedText: I successfully killed 3 wargs enemies, I should report to the quest giver.
Quest.quest_UnlockText: Hello Wanderer, welcome to our little town, could you please go to the wolfs den and kill three of these vile spawns ? You will be greatly compensated ! Thank you for listening to my plea Wanderer !
Quest.quest_CompleteText: I successfully killed the 3 wargs for the old lady in the town of Dorlice
Quest.quest_RewardText: I successfully killed the 3 wargs for the old lady in the town of Dorlice, I talked to the old lady and got the money for my work.

Quest.quest_ShortInProgressText: I have to kill 3 Orcs enemies, I should found some in the Orcs forest.
Quest.quest_ShortInFailedText: I failed to kill the 3 Orcs enemies in due time...
Quest.quest_ShortCompletedText: I successfully killed 3 Orcs enemies, I should report to the quest giver.
Quest.quest_UnlockText: Hello Wanderer, welcome to our little town, could you please go to the Orcs den and kill three of these vile spawns ? You will be greatly compensated ! Thank you for listening to my plea Wanderer !
Quest.quest_CompleteText: I successfully killed the 3 Orcs for the old lady in the town of Dorlice
Quest.quest_RewardText: I successfully killed the 3 Orcs for the old lady in the town of Dorlice, I talked to the old lady and got the money for my work.

Quest.quest_UnlockText: Hi again Wanderer, could you please gather 3 beasts skins to help us with the upcoming winds of winter ? Your help would be greatly appreciated, also I will reward you for your hardships of course.
Quest.quest_CompleteText: I gathered the 3 beasts skins for the old lady.

Quest.quest_UnlockText: Hello Wanderer, the tower illuminated three days ago, I think that's why you came to out little town of Dorlice ? Maybe you could learn more about this tower if you get near the statues... They didn't reacted despite all of we did since 3 days. Maybe you'll be the chosen one and will be granted an access of some sort ? Heh, I know, why a wanderer like you would be of any use right ?
Quest.quest_CompleteText: I found the entrance of the Nexus. I should probably look around the place a bit
